name: FOR_BLOCK
input: main() { a= 1; for (i=0; i<3; i=i+1) { a = a*2;} return a; }

name: WHILE_RETURN
input: main() { a= 1; while () { a = a*2; if (a>4) { return a; } } }

name: MULFUNC1
input: main() { return a() + a(); } a() { return 3 * 4; }

name: MULFUNC2
input: main() { return a() + b(); } a() { return 3 * 4; } b() { return 5 / 2; }

name: ARG0
input: main() { return a(1); } a(x) { return x * 4; }

name: ARG1
input: main() { return a(9,3); } a(x,y) { return x / y; }
